DataElement.preferredName: Chart Abstraction Blood Transfusion Reaction Assessment Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The process of reading the record of a health encounter to determine and document the condition the patient had, the cause, and the treatment prescribed. This information is typically assigned standard clinical terminology codes._The infusion of components of blood or whole blood into the bloodstream. The blood may be donated from another person, or it may have been taken from the person earlier and stored until needed._A response generated by a stimulus._a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease

This information is typically assigned standard clinical terminology codes._The infusion of components of blood or whole blood into the bloodstream. The blood may be donated from another person, or it may have been taken from the person earlier and stored until needed._A response generated by a stimulus.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The process of reading the record of a health encounter to determine and document the condition the patient had, the cause, and the treatment prescribed. This information is typically assigned standard clinical terminology codes.

Property.preferredDefinition: The infusion of components of blood or whole blood into the bloodstream. The blood may be donated from another person, or it may have been taken from the person earlier and stored until needed.:A response generated by a stimulus.

Concepts.definition: The injection of whole blood or a blood component directly into the bloodstream.
A response generated by a stimulus.

ReferenceDocuments.name: uses existing medical records
ReferenceDocuments.description: uses existing medical records to determine whether an adverse reaction occurred and whether it was caused by the transfusion.
